TopicTitle: J-X4 Whiplash is severly underpowered comparativly to other engines

Articles.Content: Built a SR-71 clone as faithfully as I could and was wondering why I was barely holding Mach 1.  Back at the Vab started looking at the thrust numbers and it appears the Whiplash only offers an extra 10 kN of thrust over the J-33 Wheesley leaving it as a bad option as it also weighs .3 tons more!?
The Panther has the same afterburner thrust and efficiency, but is also a fair bit lighter and can also switch to a more efficient mode.
Yes thats a valid option currently but Im looking to have the whiplash viable for the final product.  Panther would be my best option currently but for future builds whiplash needs to be corrected.
